Method Detail

getSprite

public static greenfoot.GreenfootImage getSprite(java.lang.String spriteSheetFile,
                                                 int id,
                                                 int blockWidth)
This uses an ID where 0 will be the first image on the sheet. The block width is the width of a SQUARE block on the sheet, the returned image will also be a SQUARE block.

Parameters:
spriteSheetFile - The sprite sheet image file.
id - The sprite id

The sprite is returned by the following algorithm.
int cols = spriteSheet.getWidth() / blockWidth;
int x = (id % cols) * blockWidth;
int y = (id / cols) * blockWidth;

blockWidth - The sprite block width. Ex.: if the block width was 32 the sprite size is 32x32 pixels.
Returns:
A GreenfootImage base on the sprite.
